description1.description: Works as a Python back-end developer, performing the following activities:
description1.item1: Develop reliable, reusable, and scalable code.
description1.item2: Develop back-end integrations with services and databases.
description1.item4: Enhance the functionality of existing systems to ensure better performance and usability of applications.

description2.description: Worked as an assistant on the R&D project titled Speech to Text: Virtual Assistant for Operation Centers (PD-00063-3071/2020):
description2.item1: Assist and perform administrative support activities for the project, following guidance from the project team.
description2.item2: Support in overseeing the processing of documents related to the project with Contracted and Partner companies.
description2.item3: Attend and support regular status and project definition meetings.
description2.item4: Assist in the development of methods, logic, and algorithms.

description3.description: Worked in the post-operation sector, assisting in activities in the following systems:
description3.item2: SAMUG – Apportionment of Operational State Changes of Generating Units
description3.item4: SAGIC – Apportionment of Generation, Load, and Exchange
description3.item5: SAIPC – Apportionment of Interruptions at Control Points
description3.item6: SAMUST – System for Apportionment of Transmission System Usage Amounts

description4.item1: Developed a computational application for the management of electricity purchase contracts.
description4.item2: Developed a web tool to assist in reducing wind generation due to the limit of transmission line loading.
description4.item3: Developed a web platform for recording voice transcriptions of operators in the electricity sector.

summary.line3: I have experience in Data Science, covering Natural Language Processing (NLP), Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR), and Computer Vision (CV).
